original: <30>% chance to absorb <mag> points of stamina.
With the Sovereign Band equipped, <10>% chance targets that fail to resist are paralyzed for <dur> seconds.
string: 裝備王者指環時，抵抗失敗的目標有<10>的機率麻痺<dur>秒。

original: Burns the target for <mag> points. 30% chance for frost and shock to do <mag> points of damage.
string: 灼燒目標，造成<mag>傷害。寒霜和電擊元素有30%機率造成<mag>點傷害。

original: Summons a Lurker for <dur> seconds wherever the caster is pointing.
string: 在施法者所指之處召喚潛伏者，持續<dur>秒。

original: Summons a Dremora Lord for <dur> seconds.
string: 召喚一個魔人領主，持續<dur>秒。

original: Summons a Flame Atronach for <dur> seconds wherever the caster is pointing.
string: 在施法者所指之處召喚火焰元素，持續<dur>秒。

original: Summons a Frost Atronach for <dur> seconds wherever the caster is pointing.
string: 在施法者所指之處召喚一個寒霜元素，持續<dur>秒。

original: Adds the power <Master Over Chaos>. <8>% chance to summon a Dremora Sovereign when casting <Waters of Oblivion>.
string: 獲得特殊能力<Master Over Chaos>。在施展<Waters of Oblivion>時有<8>機率召喚魔人王者。

original: Summons a random Daedra for <dur> seconds.
<30>% chance to absorb <mag> points of magicka.
Random chance to demoralize or frenzy a target for <dur> seconds.
string: 隨機機率讓<mag>等級以下目標進入鎮定、士氣低落或狂亂狀態，持續<dur>秒。

original: Creatures and people up to level <mag> flee from combat for <dur> seconds.
string: Creatures and people up to level <mag> flee from combat for <dur> seconds.

original: Random chance to calm, demoralize, or frenzy a target for <60> seconds.
string: Random chance to calm, demoralize, or frenzy a target for <60> seconds.

original: Summons a random Daedra for <300> seconds.

<font face="$HandwrittenFont">
Orthrus,

The new route you suggested may help us avoid the pirates, but not the storms. The Sea Stallion now lies at the bottom of Pilgrim's Trench, and its cargo along with it.  If I ever find that charlatan of a priest we paid to bless the ships, I'm going to rip the amulet of Kynareth off his neck and strangle him with it.

Anyways, if you know any divers looking for a challenge, I've enclosed a potion of waterbreathing and some scrolls with this letter. It won't do anything about the slaughterfish, but at least it'll help you hold your breath.</font>
string:
<font face="$HandwrittenFont">
歐瑟魯斯：

你建議的新航線或許可以幫助我們避開海盜，但是避不掉暴風雨。海上公馬號現在沉沒在朝聖者的海溝海底，貨物也全部跟著沉下去了。要是我能找到我們付錢請來為船祈福的那個神棍祭司的話，肯定要把他脖子上的凱娜瑞絲護符扯下來把他活活勒死。

總之，你有認識想挑戰自己的潛水員的話，我隨信附上一瓶水下呼吸藥水還有幾個卷軸。雖然還是拿食人魚沒辦法，但至少不用憋氣。</font>

original: 1st of Sun's Dawn, 4E 201 Master Ellane said the Staff of Chaos was crafted by Loreth, and passed on through the generations until it was stolen by Jagar Tharn, before being shattered into pieces by the Eternal Champion. While the pieces may be lost forever, they say centuries later, a descendant of Loreth sought to recreate their magic. The results were the Arms of Chaos, magical staves that harnessed the power of the Sun and the Moon. Yet one day, the mage dismantled the staves and left them lifeless, convinced they were possessed by some unknown madness. It was my master's obsession to restore these artifacts, and in her honor, it has become mine. If only I could speak to her, I would know what to do next. 17th of Rain's Hand, 4E 201 Leave it to my late master to provide guidance on how to proceed. Going through her effects, I found a sketch of the necklace she often wore. It's identical in all ways but one - there's an orb set in the center of the amulet, teeming with fire. If it's true that Loreth's magic allowed one to travel to distant worlds, then it's possible this orb is a Sigil Stone! If my hunch is right, the staves are missing the same. 22nd of Rain's Hand, 4E 201 My spirit renewed, I scoured the archives in Winterhold and found my path forward. I must find a way to summon three Daedra, Guardians of the Sigil Stones. There's an altar on the eastern shore of Skytemple Ruins, bearing a Daedric mark. It may be what I need. 28th of Rain's Hand, 4E 201 I've hit a snag. The ring used to activate the summoning circle was buried with my late master, which I foolishly had shipped to her ancestral home. To think she even gifted me the ring, and I mistook it for sentiment! I feel thicker than Netch Jelly. Still, complaining won't undo my mistake. The name of the ship was the Sea Stallion, I wonder if I can catch it before it departs. 2nd of Last Seed, 4E 201 The courier has yet to return. I'm beginning to fear the worst; that the ship had already left the dock long before my letter arrived. I'm not sure what to do at this point. I haven't had much sleep, and my mind is starting to hear creaking noises where nothing exists. I wish my master were here still, so I could seek her wisdom. They say there is a Shrine of Akray at the pass to the south. Come morning, I will visit it and pray for an answer.
string: 第四紀元201年，日曉月1日 伊蘭大師說混沌之杖是羅瑞斯打造的，一代一代傳下來，後來卻被賈加．薩恩偷走，然後被永恆英雄粉碎。 雖然混沌之杖的碎片可能已經永遠失傳了，但傳說數百年後，羅瑞斯的一名後代曾試圖重新駕馭其中的魔法，於是製造出兩根叫做「混沌之臂」的魔杖，分別發揮太陽與月亮的力量。然而有一天，那位法師也拆解了兩根魔杖、去除魔杖的法力，因為他認為魔杖被某種未知的瘋狂掌控。 我的老師一生的追尋就是恢復這些神器的力量，為了紀念她，我也決定繼續這項追尋。真希望我能。在跟她說上話，我就會知道接下來怎麼做 第四紀元201年，雨手月17日 大師雖然已故，但果然留下了遺訓。我在整理她的遺物時，發現一張圖，畫的是她常戴的項鍊，跟實物幾乎完全一樣，只有一個差別：護符的中心有一顆球體，燃燒著熊熊的火焰。如果羅瑞斯的魔法真的可以讓人前往其他的世界，那麼這顆球體可能是印記石！如果我的直覺沒錯的話，現在兩根魔杖缺的也是印記石。 第四紀元201年，雨手月22日 我的精神一振，到了冬堡搜尋他們的資料集，果然找到了接下來要走的路。我必須想辦法召喚三個魔族，他們是印記石的守護者。天佑神殿遺址東岸有一座聖壇，上面有魔族的記號，可能正是我該去的地方。 第四紀元201年，雨手月28日 我遇上了阻礙。用來啟動召喚圈的指環，跟著大師一起下葬了。我太愚蠢了，居然把指環送回她的老家。這是她留給我的，我還以為只是一份情義而已呢！我真的跟耐區一樣笨。 不過現在抱怨也沒有用。我寄回去的東西都是「海上公馬號」運送，不知道能不能在它離港前攔截到。 第四紀元201年，末種月2日 信使還沒有回來。我開始擔心噩夢成真：我的信還沒有寄到，船就已經離港了。現在我不知道該怎麼辦。我沒怎麼睡覺，耳朵也開始聽到劈劈啪啪的聲音。 真希望老師還在，我想請教她的智慧。聽說這裡南方的隘口有一座阿克瑞神殿。明天早上我會去祈求答案。

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'>
If you're reading this, it means I'm dead, a fate I'm sure brings a smile to your face, if you're standing on your head anyway. Otherwise it would just be a frown, and we can't have that. That would be far too predictable.

For who doesn't appreciate a little chaos? Maybe I'll finish this sentence by saying flying horker loaf. Hopefully now your frowns are facing the right direction.

After all, neither rhyme nor reason has a home here. Fire is water, up is down, right is wrong. Death is life. 

And so like Dalak to Loreth before me, I speak to you now, dear apprentice, from inside this box. A wise sage might caution you to be careful when you follow my path, lest you end up in the same place. 

But I have never claimed to be wise. To me, death is yet another adventure, another possibility to explore. The same should be true of your life.</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'>
你讀到這段文字的話，就代表我已經死了。這樣的消息應該讓你嘴角都上揚了，至少倒著看是上揚，正著看就是太傷心嘴角都掉下去了，這樣不好吧，實在太好猜了。

誰不喜歡一點混沌呢？也許我這句話說完就加幾個胡言亂語，飛天海象麵包。希望現在你的嘴角。往對的方向去了。

畢竟這裡什麼都沒道理。火就是水，上就是下，對就是錯，死就是活。

親愛的徒弟，我現在從棺材裡跟你說話，達拉克也曾經對羅瑞斯這樣過。睿智的人可能會警告你，如果要追隨我的腳步務必要小心，否則可能落得一樣的下場。

但我從來不是什麼睿智的人。在我看來，死亡只是下一場冒險、下一個探索的可能。你的人生也應該有這樣的想法。</font>

original: There are stories of strange rituals taking place north of Winterhold. It may be worthwhile to investigate the surrounding ruins.
string: 有傳言表示，冬堡以北有人舉行奇怪的儀式，可能該調查周圍的遺址。

original: At the Skytemple Ruins, I found the body of a mage who was attempting to obtain three Sigil Stones to restore her magical items. However, I'll need a special ring to summon the necessary Daedra, which the mage accidentally shipped away on a cargo ship called the Sea Stallion. I'll need to visit the East Empire Company and find more information about where the cargo ship was headed.
string: 我在天佑神殿遺址找到一名法師的屍體，她試圖取得三顆印記石，才能重新恢復她的魔法物品。不過我需要一個特殊指環才能召喚需要的魔族，那名法師卻不小心讓指環在貨船「海上公馬號」上運走了。我得造訪東帝國貿易公司，了解那艘貨船開往哪裡。

original: At the Skytemple Ruins, I found the body of a mage who was attempting to obtain three Sigil Stones to restore her magical items. However, I'll need a special ring to summon the necessary Daedra, which the mage accidentally shipped away on a cargo ship called the Sea Stallion. According to a note I read at the East Empire Company, the ship is at the bottom of Pilgrim's Trench.
string: 我在天佑神殿遺址找到一名法師的屍體，她試圖取得三顆印記石，才能重新恢復她的魔法物品。不過我需要一個特殊指環才能召喚需要的魔族，那名法師卻不小心讓指環在貨船「海上公馬號」上運走了。根據我在東帝國貿易公司閱讀的筆記，那艘船沉沒在朝聖者海溝。

original: At the Skytemple Ruins, I found the body of a mage who was attempting to obtain three Sigil Stones to restore her magical items. However, I'll need a special ring to summon the necessary Daedra, which the mage accidentally shipped away on a cargo ship called the Sea Stallion. I found the ring in a coffin deep in Pilgrim's Trench.
string: 我在天佑神殿遺址找到一名法師的屍體，她試圖取得三顆印記石，才能重新恢復她的魔法物品。不過我需要一個特殊指環才能召喚需要的魔族，那名法師卻不小心讓指環在貨船「海上公馬號」上運走了。我在朝聖者的海溝深處的棺材中找到了那個指環。

original: At the Skytemple Ruins, I found the body of a mage who was attempting to obtain three Sigil Stones to restore her magical items. However, I'll need a special ring to summon the necessary Daedra, which the mage accidentally shipped away on a cargo ship called the Sea Stallion. I found the ring in a coffin deep in Pilgrim's Trench, and can now use it to summon the Daedra.
string: 我在天佑神殿遺址找到一名法師的屍體，她試圖取得三顆印記石，才能重新恢復她的魔法物品。不過我需要一個特殊指環才能召喚需要的魔族，那名法師卻不小心讓指環在貨船「海上公馬號」上運走了。我在朝聖者的海溝深處的棺材中找到了那個指環，現在就可以用來召喚魔族。

original: At the Skytemple Ruins, I found the body of a mage who was attempting to obtain three Sigil Stones to restore her magical items. Using a ring I found at the bottom of Pilgrim's Trench, I summoned three Daedra and engaged them in battle.
string: 我在天佑神殿遺址找到一名法師的屍體，她試圖取得三顆印記石，才能重新恢復她的魔法物品。我利用在朝聖者的海溝身處找到的一個指環，召喚三個魔族，並與他們戰鬥。

original: At the Skytemple Ruins, I found the body of a mage who was attempting to obtain three Sigil Stones to restore her magical items. Using a ring I found at the bottom of Pilgrim's Trench, I summoned three Daedra and vanquished them.
string: 我在天佑神殿遺址找到一名法師的屍體，她試圖取得三顆印記石，才能重新恢復她的魔法物品。我利用在朝聖者的海溝身處找到的一個指環，召喚三個魔族，並一一擊敗。

original: At the Skytemple Ruins, I found the body of a mage who was attempting to obtain three Sigil Stones to restore her magical items. Using a ring I found at the bottom of Pilgrim's Trench, I summoned three Daedra and vanquished them. On their bodies were the Sigil Stones I need to restore the relics the mage left behind.
string: 我在天佑神殿遺址找到一名法師的屍體，她試圖取得三顆印記石，才能重新恢復她的魔法物品。我利用在朝聖者的海溝身處找到的一個指環，召喚三個魔族，並一一擊敗。他們身上有著我恢復法師遺留下的神器所需要的印記石。

original: At the Skytemple Ruins, I found the body of a mage who was attempting to obtain three Sigil Stones to restore her magical items. Using a ring I found at the bottom of Pilgrim's Trench, I summoned three Daedra and vanquished them. Using the Sigil Stones I found on their bodies, I restored the relics the mage left behind.
string: 我在天佑神殿遺址找到一名法師的屍體，她試圖取得三顆印記石，才能重新恢復她的魔法物品。我利用在朝聖者的海溝身處找到的一個指環，召喚三個魔族，並一一擊敗。我利用他們身上找到的印記石，恢復了法師所遺留下的神器。

original: Search for information on the Sea Stallion
string: 搜尋關於海上公馬號的資訊

original: Craft the Arm of the Moon at a Staff Enchanter
string: 在法杖附魔器製造月亮之臂

original: Craft the Arm of the Sun at a Staff Enchanter
string: 在法杖附魔器製造太陽之臂

original: Craft the Warlock's Mark at a forge
string: 在熔爐製造巫師的印記
